entry.summary: Building an e-commerce app can be a time-consuming task, but with the right tools, it becomes much more manageable. In this guide, we'll explore how to create a robust Vue.js e-commerce application using Mock Service Worker (MSW) to simulate backend interactions. Whether you're a seasoned developer or just starting
